name: SpaceHome 2079
description:
SpaceHome 2079 is a co-op game where you guide a friendly little robot in his quest to keep his masters' home clean and tidy. Jointly control the little bot with a friend and pick up all the rubbish together. Don't step in the puddle or  you'll fry their circuits! But don't worry, the space cat can fix you. 

Winner of the Global Game Jam Glasgow 2019 "Best Design" award! 

Note: This game was designed to be played with Nintendo Switch Joy Cons. Please pair a L and R Joycon to your computer before launching the game or you won't be able to do anything!
